org.apache.drill.exec.compile

Class QueryClassLoader

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.ClassLoader
      • java.security.SecureClassLoader
        • java.net.URLClassLoader
          • org.apache.drill.exec.compile.QueryClassLoader
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Closeable, AutoCloseable

    public class QueryClassLoader
extends URLClassLoader
    Per-compilation unit class loader that holds both caching and compilation steps.
